function.name: computer
function.description: A tool that allows interaction with the screen, keyboard, and mouse of the current computer

action.description: The type of computer interaction to perform. 'key'/'type' require text parameter. 'mouse_move'/'left_click_drag' require coordinate parameter. Other actions take no additional parameters.

text.description:
Required for 'key' or 'type' actions. For 'key', use '+' to combine (e.g., 'command+c'). On Mac, converts to AppleScript. Common keys:
- Modifiers: command, ctrl, alt/option, shift
- Navigation: up/down (single line), pageup/pagedown (full page), return, tab, esc
- Special: space, delete

Examples: 'return', 'command+c', 'shift+up'

coordinate.description: Required when action is 'mouse_move' or 'left_click_drag'. Must be [x, y] coordinates as non-negative integers. Not accepted for other actions.
